TextLibrary.Text: Sunspear
Now it is time to reclaim the Tail of Sartek.
Now it is time to reclaim the Tail of Sartek.
Now it is time to reclaim the Tail of Sartek.
Now it is time to reclaim the Tail of Sartek.
Where is it?
Where is it?
Where is it?
Where is it?
It is in the Realms of War - in the village of Blackhoof. A Minotaur Slaver has it.
It is in the Realms of War - in the village of Blackhoof. A Minotaur Slaver has it.
It is in the Realms of War - in the village of Blackhoof. A Minotaur Slaver has it.
It is in the Realms of War - in the village of Blackhoof. A Minotaur Slaver has it.
So we should challenge him, like before?
So we should challenge him, like before?
So we should challenge him, like before?
So we should challenge him, like before?
Yes, but be cautious. This Slaver uses the Tail as a whip to control his slaves. It is a dangerous weapon.
Yes, but be cautious. This Slaver uses the Tail as a whip to control his slaves. It is a dangerous weapon.
